channel.title: Help only letting people from my ip log onto server
channel.description: hi, im jason. i'm hosting my server on my netgear router... but the problem is that it's not letting anyone else onto my server unless they are at my house, anyone know the problem? please help. i have already portforwarded but still nothing Thanks, JJBoss :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2007, 11:07:40 AM[/size][hr]Anyone? please?

item.title: Help only letting people from my ip log onto server
item.dc:creator: @jj_boss jj boss
item.description:
@jj_boss wrote:

hi, im jason.
i’m hosting my server on my netgear router… but the problem is that it’s not letting anyone else onto my server unless they are at my house, anyone know the problem? please help. i have already portforwarded but still nothing
Thanks, JJBoss
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2007, 11:07:40 AM[/size][hr]Anyone? please?

Read full topic
